name: Mythology Roller Coaster
description:
"As above so below"

Above the sky live birds ... and ancient gods.

Below the sky live humans ... and ancient gods.

Above the abyss live fish ... and ancient gods.

Ancient gods are everywhere, but are they so different from other living beings?

"Nihil nove sub sole"

there is nothing new under the sun

Because love and hate are just as much above the clouds as they are below the clouds and below the water.

In a very accurate environment, which is based on the great ancient authors, modeled in 3d, discover one of the greatest stories of mythology: the fight between Athena and Poseidon.

Besides writers, this story has inspired many artists over time. You will therefore discover several masterpiece, architecture, sculpture and paintings.

This experience lasts about 5 minutes.

Credits:

  • Classical statue of Athena: jiayi
  • Statue of Laocoon: Rigsters
  • Statue of Zeus: Mariano Oliva
  • Horse of Troy: Tyler Lazzareschi
  • Medusa painting from Caravaggio
